Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Requires the report on statewide opioid settlements include the amount of funds that have been spent
Summary: Requires the report on statewide opioid settlements include the amount of funds that have been spent and requires the public be provided information on how much funds have been spent.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.18, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the reporting of statewide opioid settlements
